ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of STUART JAMES MUTCH, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), for the period he is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office), effective May 18, 2020, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Toronto Regional Office).
